General.Name: Vinh Son Song Hinh Hydropower JSC
General.Description: Vinh Son - Song Hinh Hydropower Joint Stock Company produces and trades electricity in Vietnam. The company is also involved in the management services for operation and maintenance of hydropower plants; project management consultancy and construction supervision of hydropower projects; and provision of design consulting services for irrigation, transportation, and hydroelectric works. In addition, it offers consulting and supervising services for the construction of irrigation and transport works; performs electricity experiments; and trades in materials and equipment used in the hydroelectricity industry. Further, the company invests in power projects construction activities; and engages in real estate business. Vinh Son - Song Hinh Hydropower Joint Stock Company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Qui Nhon, Vietnam. Vinh Son - Song Hinh Hydropower Joint Stock Company operates as a subsidiary of R.E.E Energy Company Limited.
